items.content_html: Explore snapsave-downloader, a versatile JavaScript package designed for effortless video downloads from Instagram and Facebook. Elevate your project by seamlessly integrating this lightweight tool, enabling users to save their favorite videos for offline enjoyment.

Elevate your project by seamlessly integrating this lightweight tool, enabling users to save their favorite videos for offline enjoyment.

items.content_html: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.
items.title: ghiscoding/vanilla-calendar-picker: Vanilla Calendar is a versatile JavaScript date and time picker with TypeScript support, making it compatible with any JavaScript framework or library. It is designed to be lightweight, simple to use, and feature-rich without relying on external dependencies.

items.content_html: Glin-Profanity is a lightweight and efficient npm package designed to detect and filter profane language in text inputs across multiple languages. Whether you’re building a chat application, a comment section, or any platform where user-generated content is involved, Glin-Profanity helps you maintain a clean and respectful environment.
items.title: GLINCKER/glin-profanity: Glin-Profanity is a lightweight and efficient npm package designed to detect and filter profane language in text inputs across multiple languages. Whether you’re building a chat application, a comment section, or any platform where user-generated content is involved, Glin-Profanity helps you maintain a clean and respectful environment.
